doc.title: Without You
doc.plot: Lauren (Robin Manning) and Anthony (Maurizio Farhad) yearn to start a family. On their one-year anniversary, this plan is derailed after his sudden death. Now, she is left with the daunting task of planning his funeral with the help of her best friends Monica (Noelle Perris) and Alex (Aminisha Ferdinand). The days become excruciatingly painful to endure, as everything reminds her of Anthony. How can she go on without him? Lauren eventually decides to sell the house and start over. A year later, an innocent stroll in the park illustrates to her the possibilities to love again.
